      • getChar

        public static char getChar(TeDaGenString.Case Case)
        Returns an alphabetical character on success Note: Only standard Latin characters are returned [a-zA-Z]
        Parameters:
        Case - Determines the case of the character returned. The case can be "u" for uppercase or "l" for lower case. Defaults to "l" This parameter is optional.
        Returns:
        one random alphabetical character in a string format

      • getConsonant

        public static char getConsonant()
        Returns one random Latin consonant. Default is lower case, use the upper() modifier function to return an upper case consonant.
        Returns:
        Returns one random consonant

      • getVowel

        public static char getVowel()
        Returns one random Latin vowel. Default is lower case, use the upper() modifier function to return an upper case vowel.
        Returns:
        Returns one random vowel

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(int lenght)
        returns a string of alphabetical characters with a given lenght For readability, the string returned will always start with a consonant and will be interspersed with a vowel.
        Parameters:
        lenght - the lenght of the string
        Returns:
        a string of alphabetical characters in a string format for the given lenght

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString()
        Returns a string with random alphabetical lower case characters. For readability, the string returned will always start with a consonant and will be interspersed with a vowel. Note: Only standard Latin characters are returned.
        Returns:
        Returns a string with 2 to 9 random characters
